sentence.Network_en: Political selection is more dependent on sophistry and less on economic literacy.
sentence.Network_cn: 政治选举更多地取决于诡辩的能力，而不在于是否懂经济。

sentence.Network_en: I wasn't taken in by his sophistry.
sentence.Network_cn: 我没有被他的诡辩骗倒.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 心理学专业词汇英语翻译(S) ... sophist 智者 sophistry 诡辩 sophomania 大智妄想.
诡_互动百科 ... 诡辩【 sophism;carp;cavil;quibble】 诡辩术【 sophistry;fallacy;sophism】 诡怪【 strange; odd】.
或诡辩论（sophistry）(Sophistry)辩证法(dialektikee)本义就是对话讨论。.给你阳光多谢~你给的这篇文章还不错,题目是什么呢?你那儿还有更好的文.
胶念什么_爱问知识人 ... 牢固〖 firm〗 诡辩的〖 sophistry〗 胶轮大车 jiāonáng.

list.abs: 狡_互动百科 ... 6. 狡赖[ deny (by resorting to sophistry)] 1. 狡辩[ indulge in sophistry] 2. 狡猾，狡滑[ crafty].
he won the argument by sophistry ., 他靠诡辩赢了那场争论.
even people who use sophistry can not ignore the fact .甚至好诡辩的人不能不注意到这个事实。
写人的英语有哪些_百度知道 ... 诚实 honest 强词夺理 resort to sophistry；reason fallaciously 目中无人 be supercilious.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French sophistrie or medieval Latin sophistria, from Latin sophista (see sophist)

entry.def: Sophistry is the practice of using clever arguments that sound convincing but are in fact false.

example.ex: Political selection is more dependent on sophistry and less on economic literacy.
example.tran: 政治选举更多地取决于诡辩的能力，而不在于是否懂经济。

means.word_mean: 1. a deliberately invalid argument displaying ingenuity in reasoning in the hope of deceiving someone

auth_sentence.content: Sophistry was a science before there was science.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sophistry was a science before there was science.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sophistry was a science before there was science.

auth_sentence.content: From demagoguery to sophistry, the deniers practice the whole range of methods for manufacturing doubt.
auth_sentence.res_content: From demagoguery to sophistry, the deniers practice the whole range of methods for manufacturing doubt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: From demagoguery to sophistry, the deniers practice the whole range of methods for manufacturing doubt.

auth_sentence.content: The sophistry, willful ignorance, and illogical arguments - it is safe to say my flabber has never been so gasted.
auth_sentence.res_content: The sophistry, willful ignorance, and illogical arguments - it is safe to say my flabber has never been so gasted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The sophistry, willful ignorance, and illogical arguments - it is safe to say my flabber has never been so gasted.

sentences.en: I wasn’t taken in by his sophistry.
sentences.cn: 我没有被他的诡辩骗倒。

sentences.en: No amount of sophistry can justify one country’s intervention in the internal affairs of another country.
sentences.cn: 任何诡辩也不能证明一国干涉别国内政是正当的。
